name: Blood Mess
description:
The Health is also your Ammos, the blood makes you go faster, and bar activate a little power.  

Programing on Godot,

All assets during the 48 hours. The sounds, excepte the hub and the game over where found on internet, free of rights. 

Programmers: Mathieu Carreau, Manuel Verville-Frazao 

Art designe: Maxim Payette, Dominic Dubeau-Viel

Controls:

w,a,s,d to move arround

Mouse to aim and shoot

Space once the bar it full to activate a power
